error_client_user_not_defined: Error: Client user is not defined
no_permission_reset: You do not have permission to reset the counter.
counter_reset: The counter has been reset. In this round, you must count to **{{target}}**. (Mode: {{mode_title}})
no_permission_start: You do not have permission to start the game.
game_started: The game has started! You must count to **{{target}}**. Good luck! (Mode: {{mode_title}})
cannot_count_twice: You cannot count twice in a row!
not_a_number: That's not a number! {{reset_message}} In this round, you must count to **{target}**. (Mode: {{mode_title}})
goal_reached:

{{reset_message}} and you must count to **{{target}}**. Good luck! (Mode: {{mode_title}})
wrong_number: Wrong number! {{reset_message}} In this round, you must count to **{{target}}**. (Mode: {{mode_title}})
database_url_not_set:
DATABASE_URL not set. Please add your database URL to the .env file. This URL should be a connection string to your database.
If you don't know what this is, please refer to this documentation: https://www.prisma.io/docs/concepts/database-connectors/mysql#connection-url
If you want to use a different database provider (e.g. SQLite, PostgreSQL, etc.), please change the 'provider' field in the 'schema.prisma' file accordingly.
token_not_set:
TOKEN not set. Please add your bot token to the .env file. This token is required to authenticate your bot with Discord.
If you don't have a bot token yet, please refer to this documentation: https://discordjs.guide/preparations/setting-up-a-bot-application.html#creating-your-bot
If you have a bot token, please add it to the .env file
prefix_not_set:
PREFIX not set. Please add your desired prefix to the .env file. This prefix is used to identify commands for your bot.
If you don't know what a prefix is, it is a character that is placed before a command to tell the bot that it is a command.
For example, if you set your prefix to '!', you would use commands like '!help' or '!ping'.
Please add your desired prefix to the .env file.

game_ended: The game has ended. This channel is now a normal channel.
no_permission_end: You do not have permission to end the game.
